content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Starting with our negotiation, I believe the current proposed price is quite high for this newly built, unfurnished fifty square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Considering its location and size, I seek an opportunity to bring the price down significantly. 

As a responsible and smart individual who prioritizes efficient spending, I am looking to secure this excellent rental opportunity at a more affordable rate. I hope we can find common ground and reach an agreement that satisfies both parties, while also reflecting the current market trends. 

If you have any flexibility in the rental price, please do share your thoughts, and I will be more than happy to consider them seriously during our negotiation. 

Remember, my goal is to reach the lowest price possible while maintaining respectful communication throughout the process. 
TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
